7.13.20  6:04 pm   Do you think that "studying" music theory in the more traditional sense (books, classes) stifles creativity?

Â Â Â Â Â  if you stick to the stuff that sounds good, then you're gonna be fine

     It seems like most of the best and most creative musicians are self taught and "studied" music by playing it and trying to learn how songs they like work instead of watching tutorials or taking classes or reading books 

Â Â Â Â Â you have to do it according to what you like. because that is literally the only way to know for sure what anyone else might like
